title: Buy Equitas Small Finance Bank; target of Rs 75: Emkay Global Financial - Moneycontrol
content: Buy Equitas Small Finance Bank; target of Rs 75: Emkay Global Financial  Moneycontrol
description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Equitas Small Finance Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 75 in its research report dated May 04, 2022.
